name: wordforge
description: Connect Claude to your WordPress site for content management, styling, and commerce
long_description:
WordForge enables Claude to interact with your WordPress site through the Model Context Protocol. Manage posts, pages, media, WooCommerce products, Gutenberg blocks, and theme styles - all through natural conversation.

**Features:**
- Content CRUD (posts, pages, custom post types)
- Media library management
- Taxonomy management (categories, tags)
- Gutenberg block editing
- Full Site Editing templates
- Global styles (theme.json)
- WooCommerce product management
- AI-powered content prompts
